Find specific segments in the selected sequences then apply Text TimelineFX and load

Description: The goal is to be able to select multiple xmls that have been run through the fix premiere xmls script at various resolutions using a json file.

Description: Import selected clips from the mediahub into newly created batch groups set to clip length with a render node

Description: Convert CMYK images to RGB.

Description: Creates and connects a Cryptomatte node to a read file node if it's a cryptomatte.

Description:
Create a new reel on the Desktop and/or folder in the MediaHub Files tab using
tokens, including a token to continue a number sequence in a sequence of existing
folders.

Takes the selected folders in the Media Hub, gets a listing of the directory,
and copies the output to the clipboard.

Description: Copy the filepaths of the selected items.

Description: Copy location of item inside of Flame (as opposed to the path in the file system).

Author: Kieran Hanrahan
Description: Simple script to copy segment name to shot name on all selected segments.

Description: Copy positioner timecode of selected timelines to the clipboard.

This script adds three custom actions to delete empty video and/or audio
tracks of a <PySequence>. The minimumVersion is set to 2021.1 because
<PySegment>.type is used.

Description: Delete one or more folders along with contents in the MediaHub File Tab view

Searches for a subdirectory of the current directory in the Media Hub.  Useful for

a search term that would quickly find the folder you need.

Author: Kieran Hanrahan

Perform find & replace on names of selected items.  Functions on Workspaces,
Libraries, Desktops, Reel Groups, Reels, Folders, Sequences, Clips, and Timeline
Segments.

Script Name: Find and Replace in Text TimelineFX
Author: Kieran Hanrahan
Description:
This script will find a specified search string within a Text TimelineFX and
replace that search term with something else without having to enter the Text
editor.

Author: Kieran Hanrahan
Description:
This script will find a specified search string within a Type TimelineFX and
replace that search term with something else without having to enter the Type
editor.

Author: John Geehreng (adjusted by Finn Jaeger to only fix corrupted actions)
Description: Fixes corrupt TLactions by exporting and then reloading the setups

Author: John Geehreng
Description: Adds a 2D stabilizer, then applies a timewarp to 'edit' out the problematic frames, followed by another timewarp to fix in between frames selected by the UI.

Author: Ted Stanley, John Geehreng, and Michael Vaglienty
Description: Fix and/or Resize Adobe Premiere XML's.

Author: Bryan Bayley
Description:
Script Name: Ratio Bug Fix
Script Version: 1.0
Flame Version: 2024.2
Written by: Bryan Bayley
Creation Date: 02.14.24

Description: There is a bug when conforming an AAF/XML with footage at a different resolution than the offline edit.
Segments with an Action timeline effect will not display the correct size/ratio. To fix this, we add a Source Color
Management timeline effect, and immediately remove it to get flame to recognize the correct resolution of the source footage.
